subject: Q4 Planning Meeting - Agenda Required
body:
Hi Team,

I'd like to schedule our Q4 planning meeting for next Thursday at 2 PM. Please confirm your availability.

Could you also send me your key priorities for Q4 so I can prepare the agenda?

Best,
John

subject: URGENT: Bug in Production - Need Fix by EOD
body:
Hi,

We have a critical bug in the payment processing module that's affecting customers. Error rate has jumped to 15%.

Can you investigate and fix this by end of day? I've attached the error logs.

This is blocking our release.

Thanks,
Sarah

subject: Meeting Notes: Architecture Review
body:
Hi all,

Thanks for joining today's architecture review. Here are the key takeaways:

Decisions Made:
- Migrate to microservices architecture
- Use PostgreSQL for primary database
- Implement Redis for caching

Action Items:
- @Alex: Create migration plan by next week
- @Jamie: Research Redis setup options
- @Sam: Document API contracts

Next meeting: Nov 29, 3 PM

Emily

subject: RE: Partnership Proposal Discussion
body:
Hi,

Thank you for sharing the partnership proposal. Our team has reviewed it and we're interested in moving forward.

Could we schedule a call next week to discuss:
1. Revenue sharing model
2. Technical integration requirements
3. Timeline and milestones
4. Legal agreements

I'm available Tuesday or Thursday afternoon. What works for you?

Looking forward to collaborating!

Rachel

subject: Code Review Request - User Authentication Module
body:
Hey,

I've completed the user authentication module and would appreciate your review before merging.

Changes:
- Implemented JWT-based authentication
- Added refresh token mechanism
- Password reset functionality
- OAuth integration (Google, GitHub)

Branch: feature/user-auth
Files changed: 8 files
Tests: All passing (coverage: 94%)

Could you review by tomorrow? I'd like to merge this for the upcoming sprint.

Thanks!
David

subject: Budget Approval Needed for Q1 2026
body:
Hi,

I need your approval on the Q1 2026 budget proposal for our department.

Key items:
- New hiring: 3 engineers ($450K)
- Cloud infrastructure upgrade ($85K)
- Software licenses ($35K)
- Training and development ($25K)

Total: $595K (8% increase from Q4 2025)

Please review the attached spreadsheet and approve by November 27th so we can finalize plans.

Let me know if you have questions.

Jessica

subject: Family Dinner This Weekend?
body:
Hi sweetie,

Hope you're doing well! It's been a while since we all got together.

Would you like to come over for dinner this Sunday? I'm making your favorite pasta. Your brother and sister will be here too.

Let me know if you can make it! Around 6 PM?

Love,
Mom

P.S. - Don't forget to call your grandmother, it's her birthday next week! üéÇ

subject: Documentation Update Required
body:
Team,

Our API documentation is outdated and causing confusion for new developers.

Could someone please update:
1. Authentication endpoints (new OAuth flow)
2. Rate limiting policies (changed last month)
3. Error code reference (missing several codes)
4. Example requests/responses

This should be done before onboarding our new team members next week.

Who can take ownership of this?

Tom
